buildCity(VertexLocation, int) - Method in class shared.model.Model
Removes three ore and two wheat from this player's ResourceList Subtracts one city from players cities count Adds settlement to players settlement count (player.resourceList.buyCity();) Replace settlement located on the given VertexLocation with a city(Map.buildCity())
buildCity() - Method in class shared.model.Player
decrements city count by one and increments settlement count by one
BuildCityRequest - Class in shared.communication.params
string type "buildCity" int playerIndex VertexLocation location int x int y String direction

buildSettlement(EdgeLocation, int) - Method in class shared.model.Model
Removes a brick, wood, sheep, and wheat from the player building the settlement(player.resourceList.buySettlement();) and creates a road located at the given EdgeLocation (Map.buildSettlment())
BuildSettlementRequest - Class in shared.communication.params
BuildSettlement { type (buildSettlement), playerIndex (integer): Who's placing the settlement, vertexLocation (VertexLocation), free (Boolean): Whether this is placed for free (setup) } VertexLocation { x (integer), y (integer), direction (string) = ['SW' or 'SE' or 'E' or 'NE' or 'NW' or 'W'] }
